content: व्यवधानं {@--1@} Intervention, interposition, separation. {@--2@} Obstruction, hiding from view; दृष्टिं विमानव्यवधानमुक्तां पुनः सहस्रार्चिषि संनिधत्ते <ls>R. 13. 44.</ls> {@--3@} Concealment, disappearance. {@--4@} A screen, partition. {@--5@} A cover, covering; शार्दूलचर्मव्यवधानवत्यां <ls>Ku. 3. 44.</ls> {@--6@} Interval, space. {@--7@} (In <ab>gram.</ab>) The intervention of a syllable or letter.
